EmailTemplate.subject: Workload Automation for the Hybrid Cloud
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://resources.turbonomic.com/safely-increase-infrastructure-utilization/trustworthy-resizing-automation?utm_id=70157000001bY1tAAE]]> HiÂ {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Workload management in your hybrid cloud, on-premises, or even just in the public cloud, should be as easy as a few clicks. For too many IT teams, it isn't that easy. View this live demo <[[https://resources.turbonomic.com/safely-increase-infrastructure-utilization/trustworthy-resizing-automation?utm_id=70157000001bY1tAAE]]> to learn how Turbonomic can help.
<[[https://resources.turbonomic.com/safely-increase-infrastructure-utilization/trustworthy-resizing-automation?utm_id=70157000001bY1tAAE]]>
In this 30 minute session, you will learn how to quickly set up workload automation in Turbonomic for scaling resources anywhere in your environment with easy-to-use policies.
We hope you find it helpful!
Regards, Team Turbonomic
